element.name: TMQTTServer.OnAccepted
element.short: Event occurs when a connection is accepted by the server

element.name: TMQTTServer.OnDisconnected
element.short: Event fires when a connection is disconnected by the client

element.name: TMQTTServerSession.Disconnect
element.descr: This method sets Connected to False and then fires the OnDisconnect event handler. It is intended to be used to provide integration with a networking stack.

element.name: TMQTTServerSession.Disconnected
element.short: This method is called when the client disconnects from the server

element.name: TMQTTServerSession.Bail
element.short: This method disconnects the connection with an error message
element.descr: This method is used to abort connections due to various protocol violations. It throws an exception.

element.name: TMQTTServer.AllowNullClientIDs
element.short: Allow clients who connect with null ClientIDs to be assigned random ClientIDs
element.descr: Default is True. When set to false, clients connecting with NULL ClientIDs will recieve MQTT_CONNACK_CLIENTID_REJECTED

element.name: TMQTTServer.RequireAuthentication
element.short: Require clients to provide a valid username and password to connect
element.descr: If false, a username and password will be validated if it is provided but connections where no username and password are provided will also be allowed. If a username and password are provided, the session will be associated with a user object. The default is false.

element.name: TMQTTServerSession.InitializeNetworkConnection
element.short: Initializes a server network connection from a CONNECT packet and returns a CONNACK response code.

element.name: TMQTTServerSession.InitSessionState
element.short: Initializes a session state from a CONNECT packet at returns true if this is a resumed session

element.name: TMQTTServer.Enabled
element.short: Setting Enabled to false will prevent the server from accepting new connections

element.name: TMQTTServer.KeepAlive
element.short: The number of seconds of inactivity before a client connection times out

element.name: TMQTTServer.StrictClientIDValidation
element.short: If True, ClientIDs may only contain letters and numbers
